name: Painter's Block
description:
For the fifth week of the Chronicles GameDev Challenge, I decided to challenge myself even more. I decided to pick up Scratch, the beginner-suited game engine, to see how far I could push it.

You can download the game and upload it to Scratch, but I would advise you just play it on its Scratch page.

Use WSAD to Move and Space to Jump. Stand still and look directly at the monster of Fear to gain inspiration, but don't let the monster touch you!
